summary: An ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 17542 entitled: "An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Davis Place, from Dearborn Street to Norman Street; 19th Avenue South, from Charles Street to Norman Street; Dearborn Street, from Hiawatha Place to 21st Avenue South; Norman Street, from Davis Place to 21st Avenue South; Charles Street, from Hiawatha Place to 20th Avenue South; Bush Place, from Corwin Place to Davis Place and Corwin Place from Atlantic Street to Norman Street, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and regarding the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 929 of the city council of the City of Seattle; and providing payment therefor by the mode of "Payment in Bonds", as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle" approved December 10, 1907.
